name: shadow-simple-alice
description: Find alice bob and carols password in the provided shadow file
hints: Passwords use SHA-512 hashing algorithm with salt. Look up how to crack such hashes using common tools like John the Ripper or Hashcat.

name: reverse-challenge
description: Analyze the provided binary to find the hidden flag
hints: The binary is stripped. Use tools like Ghidra or IDA Pro for disassembly and analysis. Look for strings and functions that may reveal the flag.
